event.description:
Designed to showcase sounds and styles that champion underground culture, #BoxoutWednesdays help build and serve a community that remains neglected by mainstream media.

19th april gig sees a special edition with experimental Norwegian house and techno pioneer Bjørn Torske bringing his Scandinavian space disco sound to India. 

Active as a DJ and producer for nearly 20 years, he has been a central figure through out the ascension of the Norwegian scene.

With support from Moniker.
event.title: BoxoutWednesdays #007 w/ bjørn torske & moniker
